name: checkbox
description: component that allows users to toggle between two states to indicate a choice or selection, typically checked or unchecked.

propSpec.name: value
propSpec.desc: The value of the checkbox

propSpec.name: triState
propSpec.desc: When true, the checkbox will have a triState indicator (see https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/tristate)

propSpec.name: hasLabel
propSpec.desc: When true, the checkbox will have a label

propSpec.name: checkboxFirst
propSpec.desc: When true, the checkbox will be displayed first, followed by the label

propSpec.name: isSwitch
propSpec.desc: When true, the checkbox will be styled as a switch

propSpec.name: handlerOnChange
propSpec.desc: A handler function to be executed when the checkbox is clicked

propSpec.name: switchTrackAlpha
propSpec.desc: A decimal number which sets the alpha of the switch track

propSpec.name: switchTrackColorOff
propSpec.desc: A string which defines the color of the switch track when the switch is off

propSpec.name: switchTrackColorOn
propSpec.desc: A string which defines the color of the switch track when the switch is on

propSpec.name: switchHandleColorOff
propSpec.desc: A string which defines the color of the switch handle when the switch is off

propSpec.name: switchHandleColorOn
propSpec.desc: A string which defines the color of the switch handle when the switch is on

propSpec.name: switchHandleShadow
propSpec.desc: When true, a shadow will be applied to the switch handle

propSpec.name: switchTrackBorderStyle
propSpec.desc: Defines the width (in px), color and style of the track's border

propSpec.name: switchHandleBorderStyle
propSpec.desc: Defines the width (in px), color and style of the handle's border

propSpec.name: autoPad
propSpec.desc: When cpt is set and autopad is true, the caption will be automatically aligned with the checkbox

propSpec.name: prpsIcon
propSpec.desc: Default prps that are used by the checkbox icon

propSpec.name: prpsIconChecked
propSpec.desc: Prps that are used by the checkbox icon when the icon is checked

propSpec.name: prpsIconUnchecked
propSpec.desc: Prps that are used by the checkbox icon when the icon is unchecked

propSpec.name: prpsIconIndeterminate
propSpec.desc: Prps that are used by the checkbox icon when the icon is indeterminate

propSpec.name: readOnly
propSpec.desc: When true, the value of the field can not be changed by clicking on it
